Summary: MTech AIS Internship Programme Briefing ( Aug 2024 batch) Integral part of the Master’s degree Worth 6 MCs .
MTech AIS Internship is an integral part of the Master’s degree . You will be Graded (you must attain a pass!) Worth 6 MCs Project Sourcing Period
Internship begins (min 20 weeks plus 1 week break in May for exam) marks will be given final presentation Aug 2025 Final presentation to ISS advisors Company will berequired to provide assessment .
you need to submit a formal project proposal into TalentConnect (TC) Do not hesitate to contact any lecturers to discuss project feasibility .
A scanned copy of internship agreement should be submitted to TC Fill up the Internship Survey (in Canvas) You may change projects until end of March 2025 .
Apply from TalentConnect and Canvas Proposal already approved, apply directly . no more TC and Canvas project options...

ISS will release projects proposals after approving them . the project proposals will be released through CANVAS or TalentConnect . you will submit your CV directly to coy by email or through talentConnect Companies
Once accepted: Fill up the IAP form (in Canvas) and submit into Canvas, only if your project is from CANVAS .
you cannot withdraw after you have signed the offer letter . choose projects carefully . click here for more information .
ISS disciplinary board will review the case and may terminate internship . no personal leave would be allowed unless the company HR or Supervisor explicitly agrees .
Disputes can sometimes arise between you and your supervisors/team mates . try to resolve the issue professionally and amicably .
if you have to leave the office, you MUST seek permission from your supervisor . be punctual in reporting to work – stick to them!

you should not spend your free time doing non project work (like surfing, reading newspaper, magazine etc) Do not loiter around staff lounge and pantry area Give you mobile number to your company supervisor and ISS Advisors

you will get an automatic “Fail” grade for the Capstone module if you have been terminated by your company . you will be dismissed immediately from the master degree programme and the University Take your internship seriously .
